comments:
Attaching 2 reports. Both are the same except 1 of them has a blob image (from the Product Lines table in Classic Models sample database) specified as the attribute of the Product Line dimension. This causes the report to fail with the following stack trace -

I am using build - Build id: 20071102-0630

Support Blob data type in data olap engine. Fix the bug.

There is still a bug in cross table image. When choosing a reference for an image cell the auto-generated expression is "row["Column Binding"]". The correct expression is "data["Column Binding"]".  Reassign this bug to gui team.
When the binding host is bound to cube, we need generate data["name"] instead of row["name"].
